resources.string: Your expressive silence speaks for itself: looks like . Take a big bottle of the tastiest laxative.
It’s lupus, by all indicators! A patient with lupus is a real gift for Dr. House. Thanks a lot for making our old man happy!
Look how taciturn you are, it’s probably Silencitis. You can’t only think all the time, your head could burst. Try to talk sometimes.
Wow, wow, how chatty you are! This is definitely Grumbleosis. You should talk less and think more.

With this set of symptoms it looks like Somethingosis. That is, the doctor has no idea what’s wrong with you. For now here is your steroids course, a five-litre enema and a pack of cough drops. And we will put you on ten yearly observations.
Tell the doctor about how bad you feel
